trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> objects that make up a row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell" /> 控制項中構成列的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> 物件的集合封裝。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects that make up a row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個類別以程式設計方式管理的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件中的資料列構成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class is commonly used to add or remove cells from a row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別常用來加入或移除的資料列中的資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> collection that represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A>集合，表示集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>物件。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> represents an individual row in the table and contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> collection that represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>代表個別資料表中的資料列，並包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>集合，表示集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects represent the individual cells in the table.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件代表資料表中的個別資料格。

trans-unit.source: To get an individual cell, you must first get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得個別資料格，您必須先取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically fill a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式填滿<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects, which represent individual cells, are added to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects, which represent the individual rows, through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> 物件，代表個別儲存格，會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>物件，代表個別的資料列中，透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 附加到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 的末端。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 的索引編號。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> to the end of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來加入指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>結尾<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Add%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Add%2A>方法，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The location in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> at which to add the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 中要加入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 加入在指定索引位置的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來插入指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> to the middle of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddAt%2A>方法，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>中間的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The array containing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，包含要加入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Appends the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> objects from the specified array to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 物件從指定的陣列附加至集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddRange%2A> method to append the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects from the specified array to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將附加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>從指定的陣列至集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you are constructing a row of a table.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用於您正在建構資料表的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To construct a row of a table, first create an array of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to represent the cells of the row.
trans-unit.target: 若要建構資料表的資料列，請先建立的陣列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>代表資料列的儲存格的物件。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddRange%2A> method, passing the array as an argument, to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，傳遞陣列當做引數，若要加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件加入集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects from an array to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件的陣列，若要從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="cells" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cells" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> objects from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 移除所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Count%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來移除所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>並設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Count%2A>屬性設為 0。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>, but it does not remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>，但它不會移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to also remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> if you want to completely remove a row from the table.
trans-unit.target: 請務必也移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>如果您想要完全移除資料表中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects from the center row of the table and replace them with new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Clear%2A>方法移除所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>中心資料表的資料列中的物件，並取代新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 接收複製項目的以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the items.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中要接受項目的第一個索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting with the specified index in the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 將項目從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 複製到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，從 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的指定索引開始。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法的內容複製<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>指定<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定索引處開始。

trans-unit.source: The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: `array`參數必須是以零為起始<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> into the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法，將複製的項目從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>到指定的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 物件數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 物件數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the number of cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷中的資料格數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Count%2A> property is often used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Count%2A>逐一查看集合以判斷右上繫結時，通常會使用屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Count%2A>屬性來判斷中資料格數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> is an instance the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>是執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to get the index of in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 中的索引的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 中指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> within the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 的指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that a match has not been found.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示沒有找到相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine the index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來判斷指定的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> is not found, an index of -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>是找不到，就會傳回-1 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.GetCellIndex%2A> property to display the column index of the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.GetCellIndex%2A>屬性來顯示所選資料格的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> implemented object that contains all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 實作的物件，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 中所有的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> implemented object that contains all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> objects within the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 實作物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 內的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> implemented object that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來建立<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作可以可重複查看輕鬆地取得每個項目中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>取得的項目目前的屬性指向集合中。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>移至下一個項目，集合中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move the enumerator back to the initial position.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來移動列舉值傳回的初始位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method must be called after creating a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> implemented object or after using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>必須呼叫方法，在建立之後<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作物件或之後使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以將列舉值移至集合中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 否則，項目會由<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>未定義屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> implemented object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作物件。

trans-unit.source: It is then iterated through to display the items in the selected row.
trans-unit.target: 它會逐一選取的資料列中顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 是否唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回`false`表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>可以在所有情況下寫入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 的存取是否為同步處理 (安全執行緒)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性衍生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>就會覆寫永遠傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>屬性，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index value that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to return.
trans-unit.target: 指定要傳回的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 其循序索引值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從在指定的索引的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> that represents an element in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> at the specified index using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個索引子以取得個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>使用簡單陣列標記法指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用索引子以取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 中移除。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來移除指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove the center column from the table.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Remove%2A>方法來移除資料表中的中央資料行。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 從指定索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 移除。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove the fourth column from the table.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法來移除資料表中的第四個資料行。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> collection is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>集合是以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用來同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Object，可用來對集合同步存取。

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> itself.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中傳回的物件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>本身。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.SyncRoot%2A>屬性，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: The object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要新增至集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The index at which the object was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 物件加入集合所在處的索引。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add an element to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將項目加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否包含在集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件包含在集合裡，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Contains%2A> method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Contains%2A>方法是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回集合中第一個符合項目之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the object within the collection; otherwise, -1 if the object is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 物件在集合中第一個符合項目之以零起始的索引；如果物件不在集合中，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.GetCellIndex%2A> method to get the index of an element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.GetCellIndex%2A>方法來取得中項目的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23IndexOf%2A> method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23IndexOf%2A>方法是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the collection at which to insert the object.
trans-unit.target: 集合中要插入之物件的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要插入集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an object into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 插入物件至集合中的指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add an element to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.AddAt%2A>方法，將項目加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>物件。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A>方法是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要取得或設定之以零為起始的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to remove an element from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> object.
